title: OnePlus is working on OxygenOS 13, not Unified OSâ€¦ maybe?
content:
OnePlus has had an interesting history, starting from the early flash sales days of the OnePlus One, going down to the more conventional online launch of their recent flagship, the OnePlus 10 Pro. The OnePlus 10 Pro is the only device in the OnePlus 10 series so far, and it remains restricted only to China

The post OnePlus is working on OxygenOS 13, not Unified OS… maybe? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OnePlus has announced an Open Ears Forum around OxygenOS 13, indicating that it is not working on its Unified OS for now. Read on!
